ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Advice on Words of Darkness Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/00 8:37:48 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... evening ... to ... was ... I have killed 100s of shadowmen in various zones in my various
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/00 8:37:48 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
srowe@... writes:

> I know it is a rare drop and I have heard that if it is going to drop you
> will see it in the hands of the MOB but, I was camping shdaowmen this
evening
> prior to beginning the quest and we killed 10 or 12 that had what appeared
to
> be a book in their hands, yet when the MOB died the book disappeared and
was
> not on the corpse.


I have killed 100s of shadowmen in various zones in my various lives. This is
a more an ultrarare drop than a rare one. The "I can see it in their hands"
is not correct. I wish it were. No reason to hail anyone to get the quest
started that I know of, just go see him after you get the book. I saw the
most drop in WC, but last I heard the shadowman behind the tomb in MM Castle
drops it more often than anyone. Bad part is this is a hit on Temple of Ro
faction and a plus to Shadowmen faction so you should make sure your Temple
faction is great before you go this route. He is also the guy that gives
another quest piece, sorry its early I forget which, for giving him the
flower you find in the tomb. Maybe youc an keep doing the flower quest over
and over as you kill him and keep Temple faction alive. Yeah this is cheesy,
but I feel being a necro is no different than a car salesman. Get what you
want, lie cheat and steal as needed.
